question: Kindly give me a supplication that I could make for you because the hadiths you sent me by e-mail benefittoo much.
answer:
QUESTION
Salam Alaykum wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh May Allah reward you for all these efforts and admit you into Jannatul-Firdaus. In addition to that, please give me a supplication that I could make to thank Allah too much because I can see that I can't count his blessings upon me. Please, give me a supplication to which Allah may say,"My servant thanks me too much." Jazak Allah khayran.
ANSWER
